title: Theatre: By the end of grade 12
subject: Visual and Performing Arts (2020-)

document.title: 2020 Visual & Performing Arts Student Learning Standards

3F3125F97AB3448FBD371CB867DBF6DE.description:
Justify the creative choices made in a devised or scripted theatre work based on a
critical interpretation of specific data from theatre research.

B7F6295DA43D4673B1F2FEA6F29929AA.description:
Develops devised or scripted theatre work that identifies and questions cultural,
global, and historic belief systems.

2BB9A69889A94012875E17A96CBDD94D.description:
Explore how personal beliefs and biases can affect the interpretation of research
data applied in devised or scripted theatre work.

4ED081E9FA2C4D53A8DC9973A41560FB.description:
Integrate conventions and knowledge from different art forms and other disciplines
to examine cross-cultural devised or scripted theatre works.

286A0FC1E94A4C02BA62157032129D2E.description:
Use basic research methods to better understand the social and cultural background
of devised or scripted theatre work.

734FE5DB4F81485D9FCDABFD8526DA8C.description:
Integrate knowledge of cultural, global and historic belief systems into creative
choices in a devised or scripted theatre work.

06BFDA098AF04B459EF62AD135DD4AF9.description:
Relating artistic ideas and works within societal, cultural, and
historical contexts to deepen understanding.

249D45CB8BCE46A394A905D6FB91B87D.description:
Collaborate on devised or scripted theatre work that examines a critical global issue
using multiple personal, community and cultural perspectives.

0D23C49613784D81849E7F77036FDBED.description:
Choose, interpret and perform devised or scripted theatre work to reflect or question
personal beliefs.

F868A012240D4B729A237A6162B40DC9.description:
Investigate how cultural perspectives, community ideas, and personal beliefs
impact a devised or scripted theatre work.

3A2C7CE61CA34E1D9AEBD771E8D44E37.description:
Synthesizing and relating knowledge and personal experiences to
create products.

FC9B00C4BF8F4061B9F4BC036EC46063.description:
Support and explain aesthetics, preferences, and beliefs to create a context for
critical research that informs artistic decisions in devised or scripted theatre work

3914099B561A463C9AE953C84A928BB6.description:
Use understandings of cultures and contexts to shape personal responses to devised
or scripted theatre work.

6C89FFF1E0644745BD8A110EC559D10E.description:
Use detailed supporting evidence and appropriate criteria to revise personal work
and interpret the work of others when participating in or observing devised or scripted theatre work.

765129572350424382395F68425205C0.description:
Debate and distinguish multiple aesthetics, preferences and beliefs through
participation in and observation of devised or scripted theatre work.

242CB85D7B154F4D80C87A974868BECB.description:
Apply concepts from devised or scripted theatre work for personal realization about
cultural perspectives and understanding.

19AD2F1EB35A41C5AD34BA4D125ADFB0.description:
Develop detailed supporting evidence and criteria to reinforce artistic choices when
participating in or observing devised or scripted theatre work.

11FA3FDB2AE9491980465C80E375D35B.description:
Justify personal aesthetics, preferences and beliefs through participation in and
observation of devised or scripted theatre work.

A8BCC9C7293241358C8B6525CEA5FA75.description:
Identify and compare cultural perspectives and contexts that may influence the
evaluation of a devised or scripted theatre work.

A3D01347D8734DCD83A6F8050503960A.description:
Analyze and compare artistic choices developed from personal experiences in
multiple devised or scripted theatre works.

D2360202AA044F7D9A49AA0DF7EE4A4F.description:
Compare and debate the connection between devised or scripted theatre work
and contemporary issues that may impact audiences.

97BA56B417F14BC7AE3693ABF0FE3191.description:
Analyze and evaluate varied aesthetic interpretations of production elements for
the same devised or scripted theatre work.

FC06F0ADC55247D2B2C1C2A604701656.description:
Research and synthesize cultural and historical information related to a devised
or scripted theatre work to support or evaluate artistic choices.

31D8B184C5384208B05C93D0FB375E5D.description:
Verify and articulate how a devised or scripted theatre work communicates for a
specific purpose and audience.

CBEB4779BAD14511972F79B09A19CB55.description:
Construct meaning in a devised or scripted theatre work considering personal
aesthetics and knowledge of production elements while respecting others' interpretations.

53225AB3E6334178A84DD2A5B68A7941.description:
Analyze and assess a devised or scripted theatre work by connecting it to art forms,
history, culture, and other disciplines using supporting evidence and criteria.

AD9AA83AC6904D2384C46DA96E225964.description:
Formulate a deeper understanding and appreciation of a devised or scripted theatre
work by considering its specific purpose or intended audience.

9884A00FE2914804B6B94B6C995ECBC0.description:
Evaluate the aesthetics of the production elements in a devised or scripted theatre
work and their ability to support or extend the storyline.

A9419A5CBF31461B9198DF9DD6BE6B59.description:
Examine a devised or scripted theatre work and identify the supporting
evidence/criteria for its effectiveness to communicate the central message considering the play’s
history, culture, and political context.

6934F96590ED4442B188671FEFD1F430.description:
Use historical and cultural context to structure and justify personal responses to
devised or scripted theatre work.

015476C80D9042489FE5E9D13A8D2ADB.description:
Demonstrate an understanding of multiple interpretations of artistic criteria and how
each might be used to influence future artistic choices of devised or scripted theatre work.

EC3C080EE22F45378F3435D3BE1CDF12.description:
Apply theatre elements and production values to formal and informal evaluations or
artistic choices in a theatrical work

8F18388778C14E269CE079CC85F7EC2B.description:
Respond to what is seen, felt and heard in devised or scripted theatre work to develop
criteria for artistic choices

5A3CB2A7B9CC41099EB4DDCF22297954.description:
Collaboratively analyze how artistic choices in a theatrical work affect personal and
peer reactions.

57061358BF7D4335AEFC56D1E667E92D.description:
Utilize personal reactions and reflections to artistic choices in a theatrical work for a
formal theatre critique.

B17E234C39C5471EB4576398977D1AC3.description:
Produce a devised or scripted theatre production for a specific audience that employs
research and analysis grounded in the creative perspectives of the playwright, director, designer, and
dramaturg.

88EC867ABA1940D2B30E07C2B9150EEC.description:
Produce devised or scripted theatre work using a creative process that shapes the
production for a specific audience.

C3B4486996B14824A6300D7E2D7100EA.description: Perform devised or scripted theatre work for a specific audience.

CA2717C33EB24B6DBE32D4A83F9E747F.description:
Experiment with various acting techniques as an approach to character development
in devised or scripted theatre work.

DA72D6E421A741EC8D23EAAB6BEF9D2E.description:
Experiment with theatrical styles to form unique choices for a directorial concept in a
devised or scripted theatre work.

2BBEC1AAC011461BB4FA139E4097BBDD.description:
Identify how essential text information, research from various sources, and the
director's concept to influence character choices in a theatre work.

B56FCEE8D98B48B4B6784EDC02760383.description:
Discover how unique choices shape believable and sustainable characters in devised
or scripted theatre work.

F53EE8FA52D4445BA241DEE58D505D56.description:
Explore and discover character choices using given circumstances in devised or
scripted theatre work.

1E9BE99B572A4C6B8E9915BB6DCF50B3.description:
Identify and explore different pacing options per character to better communicate the
story in a theatre work.

E9B99292B143423E8163BC65BCDC5228.description:
Developing and refining techniques and models or steps needed to
create products.

02F4BCB1195D43D2A25FDD2D990C1F9A.description:
Create and justify the selection of technical elements used to develop and build a
design that communicates the concept of a drama/theatre production.

4844DFD1404E48529ADCBD4A1DAC9006.description:
Create and justify a collection of acting techniques from reliable resources to prepare
believable and sustainable characters in a devised or scripted theatrical theatre performance.

14FF21BB409246E5A96482EDB49585B8.description:
Apply theatrical elements and research to create a design that communicates the
concept of a theatre production.

19D6160348D44F25A8AF2A763E998530.description:
Refine a range of acting skills to build believable and sustainable characters in a
devised or scripted theatre performance.

D9AC11C4F5EC47FBB55954169F58B8A4.description: Use technical elements to increase the impact of design for a theatre production.

FCF6B4F98BAA49E999FACDFA841496DF.description:
Rehearse various acting exercises to expand skills in a rehearsal for devised or
scripted theatre performance.

726B5D2ECE6C4F3FAE8523C86B2C922A.description:
Originate and construct technical design choices that support the story and emotional
impact of a devised or scripted theatre work.

1BAB5DAF50AB4269BD61E82F2804C178.description:
Transform devised or scripted theatre work using the rehearsal process to re-imagine
style, genre, form, and theatrical conventions.

861666AE39594015B5D900FDC7E6C91A.description:
Explore physical, vocal and psychological characteristics to create a
multidimensional character that is believable and authentic in devised or scripted theatre work.

7504456F9249473EA9737BF88479EB17.description:
Re-imagine technical design choices during the course of the rehearsal process to
enhance the story and emotional impact of a devised or scripted theatre work.

9BFC5D453BFE48948EEA412A34E26A33.description:
Use the rehearsal process to analyze and revise a devised or scripted theatre work
using theatrical staging conventions.

9F20B4C5A08E4B6988AB5331BFF4F89E.description:
Explore physical and vocal choices to develop a character that is believable and
authentic in devised or scripted theatre work.

09EF955B302F414EABCC29392AC336E6.description:
Explore technical design choices that support the story and emotional impact of a
scripted or devised theatre work.

125A51A3A1BF4CAFB94B5F2A8A407972.description: Practice devised or scripted theatre work using theatrical staging conventions.

D953E8923C8C4AF4B01D7FF882312616.description:
Use script analysis to inform choices impacting the believability and authenticity of
a character.

51A74063B6EF4E0E91AFDC27B21FB684.description:
Collaborate as a creative team to make original artistic choices in devised or scripted
theatre work.

01F076A2EDB74034ACC5088AD664623E.description:
Collaborate as a creative team to make informative and analytical choices for devised
or scripted theatre work.

35C18D2ADEC14A699DCB5A25C295CC14.description:
Cooperate as a creative team to make informative and analytical choices for devised
or scripted theatre work.

7143FC684DC1423097C43D879306DCE7.description:
Develop a dramatic interpretation to demonstrate a critical understanding of historical
and cultural influences in a devised or scripted theatre work.

1396DD1A7F0040DFA6ECD3EBA953DF78.description:
Examine the collaborative nature of the actor, director, playwright, and designers,
and explore their interdependent roles.

521B6C0E5113471E81A105C207277982.description:
Explore the function of history and culture in the development and subsequent
interpretations of devised or scripted theatre work.

DAC9A5B4D2F64FFB852329CE574FBE78.description:
Integrate dramaturgical analysis with personal experiences to create a character that
is believable and authentic.

9DEFA31C37DC46E3B78F3E5A56586799.description:
Create a complete design for devised or scripted theatre work that incorporates
multiple elements of technology.

F09B1A0193A246578C15AF5C28E28E53.description:
Synthesize knowledge from a variety of theatrical conventions and technologies to
create the visual composition of devised or scripted theatre work.

B80D80D5C59B41FCABAEB5B12C0993D4.description:
Use personal experiences and knowledge to develop a character that is believable and
authentic.

39384217CD424FBDA0120A3F04BCFF31.description:
Understand and apply technology to design choices for devised or scripted theatre
work.

20748B246BF042389A72F34A5E7F9E22.description:
Investigate historical and cultural conventions and their impact on the visual
composition of devised or scripted theatre work.

74DD6F1BCA84472DB5E93E769B47115D.description:
Use script analysis to generate ideas about a character that is believable and
authentic.

F8F1DA88FFC2445E831D4577BFE5BF1E.description:
Explore the impact of technology on design choices in devised or scripted theatre
work.

A45633DCAABB408FB8C20065E42C4DC0.description:
Research to construct ideas about the visual composition of devised or scripted
theatre work.
